policy.notes: Exceptions are temporary governance records, not permanent bypasses.

exceptions.rationale: Runtime core is intentionally protected from content batch helper rewrite; manual/runtime-governed changes only.
Module skeleton is a template/runtime contract surface and is tracked outside content migration batches.
module_skeleton_* files are template entrypoint names by design and are not NPC rollout hook targets.
controller layer is runtime-governed and intentionally excluded from content batch migration scope.
